snippet.title: Deus Ex: The Conspiracy cinematic  intro
snippet.description:
The cinematic from the PS2 version of Deus Ex

Ripped from the game itself, by Mr Cyberpunk of the OTP forums

This is from the PS2 version of Deus ex which had cinematic endings and intros instead of in-engine like the PC version.

EDIT-June 5, 08: added annotations for the PS2 explanation, and cut lines. The annotation will come up right when the cut line is supposed to be said. For the full effect; pause the video when it comes up, read it, then continue the video.
